text: Chandera Railway Station is a minor railway station serving the town of Trikaripur in the Kasaragod District of Kerala, India. Only four passenger trains stop here. It lies in the Shoranur - Mangalore Section of the Southern Railways. Trains halting at the station connect the town to places like Kozhikode, and Mangalore. . ==References== Category:Railway stations in Kasaragod district Category:Palakkad railway division
title: Chandera railway station
